items.summary: Update `frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogin.tsx` so the "Claim Superadmin" action calls ONLY the backend method `actor.claimSuperadmin()` and does not call (directly or indirectly from this click handler) any profile/role-assignment methods such as `saveCallerUserProfile()` that can trigger the backend error "Unauthorized: Only admins can assign user roles".

In `frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogin.tsx`, add a one-time on-mount check that calls `actor.isSuperadminClaimed()` exactly once (when an actor is available) and uses its result to set `superadminClaimed`, so the claim UI is only offered when superadmin has not yet been claimed.

Harden `frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogin.tsx` against actor readiness issues: prevent backend calls for claim/check actions when the actor is still initializing, and show a non-crashing inline warning instead of attempting the call.
